Basic.name: Arcane Missiles
Basic.text: Deal $3 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Basic.flavor: You'd think you'd be able to control your missiles a little better since you're a powerful mage and all.

Basic.name: Arcane Shot
Basic.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

Basic.name: Blessing of Might
Basic.flavor: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

Basic.name: Claw
Basic.text: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor.
Basic.flavor: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

Basic.name: Corruption
Basic.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
Basic.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!

Basic.name: Deadly Poison
Basic.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

Basic.name: Elven Archer
Basic.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.

Basic.name: Execute
Basic.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.

Basic.name: Frost Shock
Basic.text: Deal $1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
Basic.flavor: FROST SHOCK!

Basic.name: Goldshire Footman
Basic.flavor: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

Basic.name: Grimscale Oracle
Basic.flavor: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

Basic.name: Hand of Protection
Basic.flavor: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

Basic.name: Healing Totem
Basic.text: At the end of your turn, restore 1 Health to all friendly minions.

Basic.name: Holy Smite
Basic.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

Basic.name: Humility
Basic.flavor: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That's "Humidity."

Basic.name: Hunter's Mark
Basic.flavor: Never play 'Hide and Go Seek' with a Hunter.

Basic.name: Light's Justice
Basic.flavor: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He'd animate them and have them dance for him.

Basic.name: Mind Vision
Basic.text: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
Basic.flavor: I see what you did there.

Basic.name: Mirror Image
Basic.flavor: Oh hey it's Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s'ti yeh hO

Basic.name: Mortal Coil
Basic.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
Basic.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

Basic.name: Murloc Raider
Basic.flavor: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

Basic.name: Northshire Cleric
Basic.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
Basic.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

Basic.name: Power Word: Shield
Basic.text:
Give a minion +2 Health.
Draw a card.
Basic.flavor: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

Basic.name: Rockbiter Weapon
Basic.text: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
Basic.flavor: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

Basic.name: Sinister Strike
Basic.text: Deal $3 damage to the enemy hero.
Basic.flavor: There's something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

Basic.name: Soulfire
Basic.text: Deal $4 damage. Discard a random card.
Basic.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

Basic.name: Stonetusk Boar
Basic.flavor: This card is boaring.

Basic.name: Timber Wolf
Basic.flavor: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

Basic.name: Tracking
Basic.text: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
Basic.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!

Basic.name: Voidwalker
Basic.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

Basic.name: Voodoo Doctor
Basic.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

Basic.name: Whirlwind
Basic.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

Classic.name: Abusive Sergeant
Classic.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack this turn.
Classic.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

Classic.name: Angry Chicken
Classic.text: Enrage: +5 Attack.
Classic.flavor: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

Classic.name: Argent Squire
Classic.text: Divine Shield
Classic.flavor: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

Classic.name: Bananas
Classic.text: Give a minion +1/+1.

Classic.name: Bestial Wrath
Classic.text: Give a friendly Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
Classic.flavor: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

Classic.name: Blessing of Wisdom
Classic.text: Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
Classic.flavor: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

Classic.name: Blood Imp
Classic.text: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Classic.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

Classic.name: Bloodsail Corsair
Classic.text: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
Classic.flavor: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It's called the "Pirate's Code".

Classic.name: Cold Blood
Classic.text: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
Classic.flavor: "I'm cold blooded, check it and see!"

Classic.name: Conceal
Classic.text: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
Classic.flavor: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can't get 'em to shut up about feelings.

Classic.name: Dust Devil
Classic.text: Windfury. Overload: (2)
Classic.flavor: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

Classic.name: Earth Shock
Classic.text: Silence a minion, then deal $1 damage to it.
Classic.flavor: Earth Shock? Shouldn't it be "Azeroth Shock"?

Classic.name: Eye for an Eye
Classic.text: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
Classic.flavor: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

Classic.name: Flame Imp
Classic.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
Classic.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

Classic.name: Forked Lightning
Classic.text: Deal $2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
Classic.flavor: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

Classic.name: Hound
Classic.text: Charge

Classic.name: Hungry Crab
Classic.text: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
Classic.flavor: Murloc.  It's what's for dinner.

Classic.name: Ice Lance
Classic.text: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal $4 damage instead.
Classic.flavor: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren't as effective.

Classic.name: Inner Fire
Classic.text: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
Classic.flavor: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

Classic.name: Leper Gnome
Classic.text: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
Classic.flavor: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

Classic.name: Lightning Bolt
Classic.text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
Classic.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

Classic.name: Lightwarden
Classic.text: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
Classic.flavor: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

Classic.name: Mana Wyrm
Classic.text: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
Classic.flavor: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn't leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

Classic.name: Murloc Tidecaller
Classic.text: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.
Classic.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

Classic.name: Naturalize
Classic.text: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
Classic.flavor: Another one bites the dust.

Classic.name: Noble Sacrifice
Classic.text: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
Classic.flavor: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

Classic.name: Power Overwhelming
Classic.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
Classic.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

Classic.name: Redemption
Classic.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
Classic.flavor: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

Classic.name: Repentance
Classic.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
Classic.flavor: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

Classic.name: Savagery
Classic.text: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
Classic.flavor: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

Classic.name: Secretkeeper
Classic.text: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
Classic.flavor: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.

Classic.name: Shield Slam
Classic.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
Classic.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

Classic.name: Shieldbearer
Classic.text: Taunt
Classic.flavor: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

Classic.name: Southsea Deckhand
Classic.text: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
Classic.flavor: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

Classic.name: Upgrade!
Classic.text: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1. Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
Classic.flavor: Easily worth 50 DKP.

Classic.name: Worgen Infiltrator
Classic.text: Stealth
Classic.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Classic.name: Worthless Imp
Classic.text: You are out of demons! At least there are always imps...

Classic.name: Young Dragonhawk
Classic.text: Windfury
Classic.flavor: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

Classic.name: Young Priestess
Classic.text: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
Classic.flavor: She can't wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

Promo.name: Emboldener 3000
Promo.text: At the end of your turn, give a random minion +1/+1.

Promo.name: Homing Chicken
Promo.text: At the start of your turn, destroy this minion and draw 3 cards.

Promo.name: Poultryizer
Promo.text: At the start of your turn, transform a random minion into a 1/1 Chicken.

Promo.name: Repair Bot
Promo.text: At the end of your turn, restore 6 Health to a damaged character.

Naxxramas.name: Avenge
Naxxramas.text: Secret: When one of your minions dies, give a random friendly minion +3/+2.
Naxxramas.flavor: Several paladins have joined together to deliver justice under the name "Justice Force".  Their lawyer talked them out of calling themselves the Justice League.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Frostwyrm Lair, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Deathcharger
Naxxramas.text: Charge. Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to your hero.

Naxxramas.name: Eruption
Naxxramas.text: Hero Power Deal 2 damage to the left-most enemy minion.

Naxxramas.name: Harvest
Naxxramas.text: Hero Power Draw a card. Gain a Mana Crystal.

Naxxramas.name: Jaws
Naxxramas.text: Whenever a minion with Deathrattle dies, gain +2 Attack.

Naxxramas.name: Jaws
Naxxramas.text: Whenever a minion with Deathrattle dies, gain +2 Attack.

Naxxramas.name: Mind Control Crystal
Naxxramas.text: Activate the Crystal to control the Understudies!

Naxxramas.name: Rain of Fire
Naxxramas.text: Hero Power Fire a missile for each card in your opponent's hand.

Naxxramas.name: Spectral Trainee
Naxxramas.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your hero.

Naxxramas.name: Sporeburst
Naxxramas.text: Deal $1 damage to all enemy minions. Summon a Spore.

Naxxramas.name: Undertaker
Naxxramas.text: Whenever you summon a minion with Deathrattle, gain +1 Attack.
Naxxramas.flavor: In a world where you can run to a spirit healer and resurrect yourself, Undertakers do pretty light business.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Unrelenting Trainee
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Summon a Spectral Trainee for your opponent.

Naxxramas.name: Webspinner
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Add a random Beast card to your hand.
Naxxramas.flavor: Spider cocoons are like little piñatas!
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Plague Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Naxxramas.name: Zombie Chow
Naxxramas.text: Deathrattle: Restore 5 Health to the enemy hero.
Naxxramas.howToGet: Unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
Naxxramas.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Construct Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Boom Bot
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1-4 damage to a random enemy.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Clockwork Gnome
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Deathrattle: Add a Spare Part card to your hand.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Clockwork gnomes are always asking what time it is.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Cogmaster
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Has +2 Attack while you have a Mech.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: After a while, you don't see the cogs and sprockets. All you see is a robot, a spider tank, a deathray...

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Finicky Cloakfield
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Light of the Naaru
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Restore #3 Health. If the target is still damaged, summon a Lightwarden.
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: "Light it up!" - Command given to both Lightwardens and Goblins holding Flamecannons.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Reversing Switch
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Swap a minion's Attack and Health.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Shadowbomber
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Shadowbomber does her job, but she's kind of phoning it in at this point.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Time Rewinder
Goblins vs Gnomes.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand.

Goblins vs Gnomes.name: Warbot
Goblins vs Gnomes.flavor: Mass production of warbots was halted when it was discovered that they were accidentally being produced at "sample size."

Blackrock Mountain.name: Aberration
Blackrock Mountain.text: Charge

Blackrock Mountain.name: Blackwing
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Summon a 3/1 Dragonkin. Get a new Hero Power.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Blackwing
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Summon a 5/4 Dragonkin. Get a new Hero Power.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Black
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, whenever Chromaggus draws a card, he gets another copy of it.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Blue
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, Chromaggus' spells cost (1) less.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Bronze
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, Chromaggus' minions cost (1) less.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Green
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, restore 2 health to your opponent at the start of your turn.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Brood Affliction: Red
Blackrock Mountain.text: While this is in your hand, take 1 damage at the start of your turn.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Corrupted Egg
Blackrock Mountain.text: When this minion has 4 or more Health, it hatches.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Corrupted Egg
Blackrock Mountain.text: When this minion has 5 or more Health, it hatches.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dark Iron Spectator
Blackrock Mountain.text: Taunt

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragon Egg
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 2/1 Whelp.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: Think of them as bullets for your dragon gun.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Dragonteeth
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever your opponent plays a card, gain +1 Attack.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Drakkisath's Command
Blackrock Mountain.text: Destroy a minion. Gain 10 Armor.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Echolocate
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Equip a weapon that grows as your opponent plays cards.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Guzzler
Blackrock Mountain.text: Taunt

Blackrock Mountain.name: Jeering Crowd
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Summon a 1/1 Spectator with Taunt.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Magma Pulse
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Deal 1 damage to all minions.

Blackrock Mountain.name: ME SMASH
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Destroy a random damaged enemy minion.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Mutation
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Discard a random card.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Old Horde Orc
Blackrock Mountain.text: Taunt

Blackrock Mountain.name: Old Horde Orc
Blackrock Mountain.text: Taunt

Blackrock Mountain.name: Razorgore's Claws
Blackrock Mountain.text: Whenever a Corrupted Egg dies, gain +1 Attack.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Reverberating Gong
Blackrock Mountain.text: Destroy your opponent's weapon.

Blackrock Mountain.name: The Rookery
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Give all Corrupted Eggs +1 Health, then summon one.

Blackrock Mountain.name: The True Warchief
Blackrock Mountain.text: Destroy a Legendary minion.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Toxitron
Blackrock Mountain.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Toxitron
Blackrock Mountain.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all other minions.

Blackrock Mountain.name: True Form
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Let the games begin!

Blackrock Mountain.name: True Form
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Let the games begin!

Blackrock Mountain.name: Twilight Whelp
Blackrock Mountain.text: Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, gain +2 Health.
Blackrock Mountain.flavor: The twilight whelps are basically magic-vampires. Despite this, they are not a reference to any popular series of novels.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
Blackrock Mountain.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackrock Spire, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Wild Magic
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Put a random spell from your opponent's class into your hand.

Blackrock Mountain.name: Wild Magic
Blackrock Mountain.text: Hero Power Put a random spell from your opponent's class into your hand.

The Grand Tournament.name: Arcane Blast
The Grand Tournament.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. This spell gets double bonus from Spell Damage.

The Grand Tournament.name: Brave Archer
The Grand Tournament.text: Inspire: If your hand is empty, deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.

The Grand Tournament.name: Buccaneer
The Grand Tournament.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.

The Grand Tournament.name: Competitive Spirit
The Grand Tournament.text: Secret: When your turn starts, give your minions +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Competition can be an inspiration to improve oneself.  Or kill all the competitors.

The Grand Tournament.name: Gadgetzan Jouster
The Grand Tournament.text: Battlecry: Reveal a minion in each deck. If yours costs more, gain +1/+1.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: It's not HER fault you didn't put a spinning saw blade on your horse.

The Grand Tournament.name: Injured Kvaldir
The Grand Tournament.flavor: Don't worry.  With a little skin cream he's going to clear right up.

The Grand Tournament.name: Living Roots
The Grand Tournament.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.

The Grand Tournament.name: Power Word: Glory
The Grand Tournament.text:
Choose a minion. Whenever it attacks, restore 4 Health to
your hero.
The Grand Tournament.flavor: The promise of glory is a powerful tool to get minions to do your bidding.  Only slightly less powerful than the promise of an ice cream bar!

The Grand Tournament.name: Tournament Attendee
The Grand Tournament.flavor: He was so excited to get season tickets to this year's Grand Tournament.  He normally doesn't get them at first and has to buy them from Ogre scalpers.

The League of Explorers.name: Animated Statue
The League of Explorers.text: You've disturbed the ancient statue...

The League of Explorers.name: Barrel Forward
The League of Explorers.text: Get 1 turn closer to the Exit!

The League of Explorers.name: Blessing of the Sun
The League of Explorers.text: Give a minion Immune this turn.

The League of Explorers.name: Boom!
The League of Explorers.text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy minions.

The League of Explorers.name: Consult Brann
The League of Explorers.text: Draw 3 cards.

The League of Explorers.name: Cursed Blade
The League of Explorers.text: Double all damage dealt to your hero.
The League of Explorers.flavor: The Curse is that you have to listen to "MMMBop" on repeat.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Debris
The League of Explorers.text: Taunt.

The League of Explorers.name: Dynamite
The League of Explorers.text: Deal $10 damage.

The League of Explorers.name: Eye of Hakkar
The League of Explorers.text: Take a secret from your opponent's deck and put it into the battlefield.

The League of Explorers.name: Eye of Hakkar
The League of Explorers.text: Take a secret from your opponent's deck and put it into the battlefield.

The League of Explorers.name: Naga Repellent
The League of Explorers.text: Destroy all Hungry Naga.

The League of Explorers.name: Naga Repellent
The League of Explorers.text: Change the Attack of all Hungry Naga to 1.

The League of Explorers.name: Pit Snake
The League of Explorers.text: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
The League of Explorers.flavor: It could be worse.  It could be a Snake Pit.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Rare Spear
The League of Explorers.text: Whenever your opponent plays a Rare card, gain +1/+1.

The League of Explorers.name: Rare Spear
The League of Explorers.text: Whenever your opponent plays a Rare card, gain +1/+1.

The League of Explorers.name: Raven Idol
The League of Explorers.text: Choose One - Discover a minion; or Discover a spell.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Was petrified when it found out it didn't make the cut for Azerothean Idol.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Reliquary Seeker
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
The League of Explorers.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Repairs
The League of Explorers.text: Restore 10 Health.

The League of Explorers.name: Rock
The League of Explorers.text: Taunt

The League of Explorers.name: Sacred Trial
The League of Explorers.text: Secret: After your opponent has at least 3 minions and plays another, destroy it.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Scarab
The League of Explorers.text: Taunt

The League of Explorers.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
The League of Explorers.text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
The League of Explorers.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Ruined City, in the League of Explorers adventure.

The League of Explorers.name: Spiked Decoy
The League of Explorers.text: Taunt Can't attack.

The League of Explorers.name: Stonesculpting
The League of Explorers.text: Hero Power Summon a 0/2 Statue for both players.

The League of Explorers.name: Stonesculpting
The League of Explorers.text: Hero Power Summon a Statue for both players.

The League of Explorers.name: Throw Rocks
The League of Explorers.text: Hero Power Deal 3 damage to a random enemy minion.

The League of Explorers.name: Tunnel Trogg
The League of Explorers.text: Whenever you Overload, gain +1 Attack per locked Mana Crystal.
The League of Explorers.flavor: Sure, they're ugly, but they live in tunnels.  You try your beauty routine without natural light.
The League of Explorers.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
The League of Explorers.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Bladed Cultist
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: He has a poor understanding of the law of diminishing returns.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Blood To Ichor
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If it survives, summon a 2/2 Slime.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: For his next trick, he turns the ichor back to blood and stuffs it back in you.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Bloodthistle Toxin
Whispers of the Old Gods.text:
Return a friendly minion to your hand.
It costs (2) less.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Divine Strength
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Every year a few paladins get disqualified from the Westfall weight lifting championship for using Divine Strength.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Evolve
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Evolve
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Transform your minions into random minions that cost (1) more.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: So you say you want an evolution. Well, you know. We all want to change the board.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Fadeleaf Toxin
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Give a friendly minion Stealth until your next turn.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Fiery Bat
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Forbidden Ancient
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Spend all your Mana. Gain +1/+1 for each mana spent.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: This Ancient was banned from the local tavern after tucking a 'Dr. Boom' up its sleeve.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Journey Below
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Don't stop believing there's something below.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: N'Zoth's First Mate
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Hates when N'Zoth yells "Ahoy Matey!!", but there's not really much he can do about it.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: On the Hunt
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: The mastiff giggles if you don't hit any ducks.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Possessed Villager
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Primal Fusion
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Give a minion +1/+1 for each of your Totems.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Golce and Dabbana have a new line of Earth Totems available at vendors everywhere this holiday season.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Selfless Hero
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion Divine Shield.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: "Don't worry about me… I'll just be here... under these tentacles."

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Shifter Zerus
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Each turn this is in your hand, transform it into a random minion.
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: It's like being able to play with THREE angry chickens!

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Tentacle of N'Zoth
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Because EVERYDAY is the Day of the Tentacle of N'zoth.

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Vilefin Inquisitor
Whispers of the Old Gods.text: Battlecry: Your Hero Power becomes 'Summon a 1/1 Murloc.'

Whispers of the Old Gods.name: Zealous Initiate
Whispers of the Old Gods.flavor: Ok, Initiate. You need to settle down and do your job. In this case, that means die so someone else can get a minor buff.

Karazhan.name: Arcane Anomaly
Karazhan.text:
Whenever you cast a spell, give this minion
+1 Health.
Karazhan.flavor: He used to get work as a Spacial Anomaly, but he got tired of having his polarity reversed.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Babbling Book
Karazhan.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Karazhan.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Menagerie, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Black Pawn
Karazhan.text: Auto-Attack: Deal 1 damage to the enemies opposite this minion.

Karazhan.name: Blue Portal
Karazhan.text: The character in the blue beam only takes 1 damage at a time.

Karazhan.name: Castle
Karazhan.text: Hero Power Move a friendly minion left. Repeatable.

Karazhan.name: Enchanted Raven
Karazhan.flavor: Once upon a midnight restive, Medivh pondered, feeling festive!
Karazhan.howToGet: Unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.
Karazhan.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Prologue, in One Night in Karazhan.

Karazhan.name: Runic Egg
